left JOIN rf_crm_hotel_public hp on a.id=hp.hotel_id left JOIN e_hotel e on a.id=e.id LEFT JOIN sy_org_user o ON hp.hotel_user_id = o.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN t_province p ON a.prov_code = p.code LEFT JOIN t_city c ON a.city_code = c.code LEFT JOIN t_district d ON a.dis_code = d.code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT e.id as hotelid,hu.loginname as boss_mobile,hu.`name` as boss_name FROM e_hotel e INNER JOIN h_role hr ON e.id = hr.hotelid AND hr.type = 1 INNER JOIN h_user_role hur ON hur.roleid = hr.id INNER JOIN h_user hu ON hur.userid = hu.id ) hu ON a.id=hu.hotelid
